I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.

content.text: Hey, whats your favorite thing to do?
Well, I love going to Comic Con, but only if I can wear my favorite hoodie.
I have really bad anxiety, and I find that wearing my favorite hoodie helps me feel more comfortable and at ease.
Oh, that makes sense. I'm glad you found something that helps you cope with your anxiety.
Thanks, me too. What about you? What's your favorite thing to do?
I love cooking! I find it really relaxing and creative.
Oh, that's awesome! I wish I could cook. I'm always so bad at it.
It's not that hard! You just have to follow the recipe and be patient.
Maybe I'll try it sometime. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! What do you like to cook?
I like to make pasta dishes, especially with a lot of vegetables.
That sounds delicious! I love pasta.
Me too! It's so easy to make and it's always a hit with everyone.
I know, right? It's the perfect comfort food.
Definitely! I'm so glad we met. I can't wait to try out your cooking sometime.
You're welcome! I'd love to cook for you.
Great! We should exchange numbers and make plans.
Sounds good! I'll message you later
